title: Authors and Citation
text: Edouard Legoupil. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Legoupil E (2024). ProgQA: ProgQA. R package version 0.0.900, https://github.com/unhcr-americas/ProgQA.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ProgQA: ProgQA},   author = {Edouard Legoupil},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.900},   url = {https://github.com/unhcr-americas/ProgQA}, }

title: ProgQA
text: goal ProgQA perform Quality Assurance programme data. assumed data curated ActivityInfo. package comes report template present detailed regional quality assurance review indicators

title: ProgQA
text: can install development version ProgQA GitHub : run package need set activityinfo credentials token within R environment variables - > token <- “activityinfotoken..” > print(Sys.setenv(ACTIVITYINFOTOKEN = token)) > Sys.getenv(“ACTIVITYINFOTOKEN”) > rm(token)

title: ProgQA
text: package installed, Generate report
code: ProgQA::report_qa(year = 2023, activityInfoTable= "cdn6y40lm87wi522",   folder = "dev/report") ProgQA::report_qa_light(year = 2023, activityInfoTable= "cdn6y40lm87wi522",   folder = "dev/report")

title: prepare_qa_data — prepare_qa_data
text: Note function specific specific DB schema - form query well columns variable name hard coded  need adjusted DB change

title: prepare_qa_data — prepare_qa_data
text: activityInfoTable activityInfo link db indicators got reported

title: prepare_qa_data — prepare_qa_data
text: frame content activity info DB plus indicator reference         applied QA

title: prepare_qa_data — prepare_qa_data
text: Implemented QA automatic Check  Missing M&E Data sources  Missing M&E Activity  Missing Baseline  Missing Baseline Numerator  Missing Baseline Denominator  Missing Actual  Missing Actual Numerator  Missing Actual Denominator  Incorrect Baseline (.e. >100  Incorrect Actual (.e. >100  Baseline Higher (Lower) Actual  Significant Variance Baseline Actual (+/- 2*Baseline)  Missing Data Limitation Baseline  Missing Data Limitation Actual Note also function based token stored environment  variable Credentials set environment variables - # token <- "activityinfotoken.."  # print(Sys.setenv(ACTIVITYINFOTOKEN = token))     # Sys.getenv("ACTIVITYINFOTOKEN")  # rm(token)

what: Generate a bullet chart for quick quality assurance — rbm_bullet
title: Generate a bullet chart for quick quality assurance — rbm_bullet
text: ## https://datavizcatalogue.com/methods/bullet_graph.html   Bullet Graph, main data value encoded length bar   centre chart, known Feature Measure. line marker   runs perpendicular orientation graph known Comparative   Measure used target marker compare Feature Measure   value. main bar passed position Comparative Measure,   know hit goal.  segmented coloured bars behind Feature Measure used display   qualitative range scores. colour shade (three shades grey  example ) used assign performance range rating. example,  poor, average great. using Bullet Graphs, ideal keep   maximum number performance ranges five.

Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: Run Shiny Application

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
code: run_app(   onStart = NULL,   options = list(),   enableBookmarking = NULL,   uiPattern = "/",   ... )

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. ... arguments pass golem_opts. See `?golem::get_golem_options` details.
